Trevarez Castle特雷瓦雷斯城堡
—作者相关连接—原贴地址：http://www.planetminecraft.com/project/trevarez-castle-france/作者主页：http://www.planetminecraft.com/member/mygodness/
【图片展示】

【视频欣赏】[bili=7824800]1[/bili]【地图下载】
存档：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1dEHdksxSchematic:https://pan.baidu.com/s/1hsft3Ic
【作者的话】This castle is located in France. I tried to be as accurate as possible. 
Also, it is fully furnished. I hope you will like it. Feel free to download and to use it ! 
If you like the build, please comment, diamond and suscribe ;)
这座城堡位于法国我尝试着尽可能的复原它（如果喜欢这张地图不妨去到作者的Pmc去投一个钻石或者点一个关注）
【广告】
